name: PuzzlePortals
description:
This is the first game I'm working on that wasn't a project for school. There's no real story yet so for now you're just an archer shooting arrows into portals. All the assets, except for the ghost that the player turns into upon their death, were found for free online. I'd appreciate any feedback. :)

I'm making this with Gamemaker Studio 2. It's a little buggy.
